descriptions.abbreviation: An official or commonly-used abbreviation for the resource.
descriptions.countries: The country or countries in which the resource was developed and/or is currently maintained.
descriptions.deprecation_reason: An explanation as to why this resource is no longer considered suitable for use.
descriptions.description: Free text summary of the resource and its purpose.
descriptions.domains: A domain is a term describing a cross-discipline research domain used within FAIRsharing records by curators and the user community.
descriptions.fairsharing_registry: One of the registries to which all FAIRsharing records belong, e.g. Standards, Policies, Databases.
descriptions.homepage: The homepage of the resource itself. If there is no official homepage, a related URL may be used. For policies, the resource homepage can be the policy document itself.
descriptions.how_to_cite: This is the citation information for the FAIRsharing record describing this resource.
descriptions.name: The full name of this resource.
descriptions.publication_for_citation: Use this to directly cite the resource itself.
descriptions.record_type: Each FAIRsharing registry has various types of record.
descriptions.species: The organismal taxonomies covered by this resource.
descriptions.subjects: A discipline is a term describing a subject area / academic discipline used within FAIRsharing records by curators and the user community.
descriptions.tools: Any tools associated with or maintained by this resource.
descriptions.userDefinedTags: User-defined tags that have been created by the user but not yet incorporated into the FAIRsharing vocabularies.
descriptions.year: The year in which the resource was created.
